swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.ir

Class CastingFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.ir.CastingFactory

  • public class CastingFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This factory adds castings where needed to the IR Code. Castings can be disabled by setting the property -Dfuc.irgen.castings=false
    Version:
    2
    Author:
    "Frank Zechert"

    • Field Detail

      • castingEnabled

        static final boolean castingEnabled
        Indicates whether casting should be enabled or disabled. By default casting is enabled. To disable casting set -Dfuc.irgen.castings=false

      • logger

        static final org.apache.log4j.Logger logger
        The logger

      • createCast

                   java.lang.String fromId,
                   Type toType,
                   java.lang.String toId)
                            throws IntermediateCodeGeneratorException
        Create and return a quadruple to cast fromId of type fromType to toId of type toType
        Parameters:
        fromType - The type to cast from
        fromId - The id to cast from
        toType - The type to cast to
        toId - The id to cast to
        Returns:
        The Quadruple that represents the cast.
        Throws:
        IntermediateCodeGeneratorException - Something went wrong
